data.value: 只要

data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 帮助尽可能多的人们

data.name: DONATE WITH CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD NOW
data.value: 立即用信用卡捐款

data.name: An amount of your choice to help as many people as you can.
data.value: 我自己选择的余额尽可能多地帮助他们。

data.value: 捐款：

data.name: I would like to make a
data.value: 我想

data.name: DONATE NOW USING WECHAT OR ALIPAY
data.value: 立即用微信或支付宝捐款

data.name: Or scan the QR code below with your Alipay app to donate now:
data.value: 或者用支付宝扫描下面的二维码：

data.name: Donate
data.value: 捐款

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open with Browser' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在浏览器打开”。

data.name: Please open this page in your browser.
data.value: 请在您的浏览器中打开此页面

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open in Safari' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在Safari打开”。

data.name: monthly
data.value: 每月

data.name: one time
data.value: 一次

data.name: quarterly
data.value: 每季

data.name: yearly
data.value: 每年

data.name: Amount is required.
data.value: 金额是必需的。

data.name: Please enter a valid amount.
data.value: 请输入一个有效的金额。

data.name: My urgent gift for cold weather support
data.value: 我为严寒天气提供的紧急捐款

data.name: When the weather is cold, more people come to us and they all need urgent help.
data.value: 寒冷的季节里，更多的人来到这里，寻求紧急的救助。

data.name: will double to to ￥300 and give meals and warm clothes to 20 people
data.value: 将翻倍为￥300，为20个人提供食物和冬装

data.name: will double to ￥840 and provide two weeks’ training for one person
data.value: 将翻倍为￥840，为1个人提供为期两周的培训

data.name: will double to ￥1,500 and help 100 hungry people this winter
data.value: 将翻倍为￥1500，帮助100 个饥肠辘辘的人度过这个冬天

data.name: will double to ￥3,000 to reach 200 people
data.value: 将翻倍为￥3000，帮助200个人

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and winter clothes for 6 people
data.value: 为6人提供一顿温暖的饭菜、淋浴及冬装

data.name: I want my gift to repeat automatically every month.
data.value: 我愿意每个月自动捐出同样的数额。

data.name: I would like to make a gift of:
data.value: 我想捐款：

data.name: Every hot meal we serve at the Renewal Center relies on a supporter gift of 15 RMB. And your gift of 60 RMB could provide a meal, plus one day of accommodation on our incredibly effective job training program.
data.value: 我们在日新中心提供的每顿热腾腾的餐食都需要15元人民币的捐赠。若您捐赠60元，就可以为人们提供一顿热饭，外加参与一天卓有成效的就业培训项目及寄宿费用。

data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 帮助尽量多的人。

data.name: An amount of my choice to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 尽我所能帮助尽量多的人。

data.name: Send your gift to be doubled today
data.value: 现在就捐出可以翻倍的善款

data.name: will double to $231.00 and help 100 hungry people this winter
data.value: 将翻倍为$231.00，帮助100 个饥肠辘辘的人度过这个冬天

data.name: will double to $129.40 and provide two weeks’ training for one person
data.value: 将翻倍为$129.40，为1个人提供为期两周的培训

data.name: will double to $462.00 to reach 200 people
data.value: 元人民币将翻倍为$462.00，帮助200个人

data.name: Every gift helps twice as many people today.
data.value: 今天，每份捐赠都可提供双倍的帮助

data.name: Your gift will double today – helping the Renewal Center reach twice as many people with hot meals, warm clothes and support, now and during the colder winter months.
data.value: 今天，您的捐赠将被翻倍——帮助日新中心在眼下和即将到来的冬季为人们提供更多热腾腾的餐食、温暖的冬装和支持。

data.name: will double to to $46.20 and give meals and warm clothes to 20 people
data.value: 将翻倍为$46.20，为20个人提供食物和冬装
